title: Emre Can - FC 26 - Dec 2, 2025 | SoFIFA
snippet: Emre Can (born 12 January 1994) is a German footballer who plays as a center back for German club Borussia Dortmund. In the game FC 26, his overall rating is 82.

title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: Emre Can (Turkish pronunciation: [ˈemɾe ˈdʒan]; born 12 January 1994) is a German professional footballer who plays for Bundesliga club Borussia Dortmund, which he captains, and the Germany national team.
